content: I think I need to work on finding the universal thread in my personal experiences and making them more relatable. I've been trying to write jokes about my wife and our arguments, but I realize now that they might be too specific. I need to extract the underlying emotions and situations that people can identify with. For example, instead of talking about our specific argument, I can talk about the feeling of being frustrated when someone doesn't listen to me, which is something many people can relate to.
